All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BedType
BedType that can be used BedType.SINGLE BedType.DOUBLE BedType.SUPER_SINGLE BedType.QUEEN BedType.KING
CreditCard
Represents the class of CreditCard, which allows a user to input a guest's credit card details
CreditCardController
 
CreditCardDB
Represents the derived class of DB , which is used to read and write all data to the text file that contains Creditcard.
CreditCardType
CreditCard Type that can be used CreditCardType.VISA CreditCardType.MASTERCARD CreditCardType.AMEX
FoodType
FoodType that can be used FoodType.STARTER FoodType.MAIN_COURSE FoodType.DRINKS
Gender
Genders that are available Gender.MALE Gender.FEMALE Gender.OTHERS
Guest
Represents the class of Guest, which is used to represent a person who has his records in the HRPS
GuestController
Represents the controller function of Guest
GuestDB
Represents the derived class of DB , which is used to read and write all data to the text file that contains guest.
HRPS
 
Item
Represents the class of Item, which represents an item on the menu for Room Service
MainDisplayUI
Represents the class of MainDisplayUI, which prints the UI for HRPS
Menu
Represents the class of Menu, which represents the menu for Room Service The menu is a list of Items
MenuController
Represents the controller function of Menu
MenuDB
Represents the derived class of DB , which is used to read and write all data to the text file that contains Creditcard.
MenuUI
Represents the class of MenuUI, which prints the UI for Menu-related operations
Order
Represents the class of Order, which represents an order for Room Service
OrderController
Represents the controller function of Order
OrderDB
Represents the derived class of DB , which is used to read and write all data to the text file that contains Orders.
OrderStatus
Order Status that can be used OrderStatus.PREPARING OrderStatus.PREPARED OrderStatus.DELIVERED OrderStatus.PAID
OrderUI
Represents the class of OrderUI, which prints the UI for Order-related operations
Payment
Represents the class of Payment, which holds the information at the instance the payment is made
PaymentController
Represents the controller function of Payment
PaymentDB
Represents the derived class of DB , which is used to read and write all data to the text file that contains Payments.
PaymentUI
Represents the class of PaymentUI, which prints the UI for Payment-related operations
ReadInFile
Represents the derived class of DB , which is used to read and write all data to the text file that contains guest.
Reservation
Represents the class of Payment, which holds the information at the instance the payment is made
ReservationController
Represents the controller function of Reservation
ReservationDB
Represents the derived class of DB , which is used to read and write all data to the text file that contains Reservation.
ReservationStatus
ReservationStatus that can be used ReservationStatus.CONFIRMED ReservationStatus.CHECKED_IN ReservationStatus.CHECKED_OUT ReservationStatus.EXPIRED ReservationStatus.CANCELLED
ReservationUI
Represents the class of ReservationUI, which prints the UI for Reservation-related operations
Room
Represents the class of Payment, which holds the information at the instance the payment is made
RoomController
Represents the controller function of Room
RoomDB
Represents the derived class of DB , which is used to read and write all data to the text file that contains Rooms.
RoomStatus
RoomStatus that can be used RoomStatus.VACANT RoomStatus.OCCUPIED RoomStatus.RESERVED RoomStatus.UNDER_MAINTAINANCE
RoomType
RoomType that can be used RoomType.SINGLE RoomType.DOUBLE RoomType.DELUXE RoomType.VIP_SUITE
RoomUI
Represents the class of Payment, which holds the information at the instance the payment is made
UpdateCreditCardDetails
Represents the class which enables Creditcard to be updated through user input
UpdateGuestMenu
Represents the class which enables Guest to be updated through user input
UpdateReservationDetailsDisplayUI
Represents the class which enables Reservation Details to be updated through user input
UpdateRoomMenuDisplayUI
Represents the class which enables Room to be updated through user input
